readme:
# unyield

  allow generators functions to accept callbacks

## Example

```js
var fn = unyield(function *() {
  return yield wait(100);
});

fn(function(err, ms) {
  assert(!err)
  assert(ms >= 100);
  done();
});
```

## API

### unyield(gen)

Allow a generator to either be yieldable or be a callback function. Passes arguments and context through.

## Test

```
npm install
make test
```
